name: The Samskara
description:
The Samskara is a claymation game concept with influences from  Sci-Fi and Hinduism. 

I've had a growing interest for claymation games for the past couple of years, and this winter I had a chance to develop a concept of my own. 

The Samskara is envisioned as a poetic point and click game. In the download section you can install a flip book with concept art and sketches, as well as a pdf I made during the conceptualization phase of this project.

Here below is a link to my work board with further content, inspirations and research: 

https://miro.com/app/board/uXjVOS-_8CI=/?invite_link_id=89209273452
